author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BEFORE LANDFALL... ...PREPARATIONS SHOULD BE RUSHED TO COMPLETION IN TEXAS...
summary:
...BERYL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BEFORE LANDFALL... ...PREPARATIONS SHOULD BE RUSHED TO COMPLETION IN TEXAS...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Sun Jul 7
 the center of Beryl was located near 26.3, -95.3
 with movement NNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 992 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
